name: Online Game Beta
description:
This is a simple online game, right now, all you can do is join a friend or host a game, there is no limit to how many players you can have. At this moment the map is the default Template map but soon i will add an open world map!

The full version will include:

An open world map and game modes.

To join a friend, just type their IP into the box and click join! (I would recommend using hamachi or Evolve otherwise this will not work)
